author: jensseidel
msg: (svn_cl__options."accept"): Added a missing comma which was accidentally
removed in r31501 and caused a test to fail.
This also brings some translations back to 100%.

author: cmpilato
msg: Optimize file merges performed with ancestrally related sources by
using the svn_ra_get_log2() interface to figure out in which revisions
the source really changed, and using that information to filter out
no-op revision ranges prior to merging.  We still *record* the
original set of revision ranges, of course.
the amount of work this function needs to do.

author: arfrever
msg: (svn_cl__cmd_table."resolve"): Use values of some constant definitions

author: arfrever
msg: (svn_cl__cmd_table."resolve"): Use values of some constant definitions
